bibl.title: κριθολογία and κριθολογῆναι. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The noun κριθολογία in declarations by boatmen was used in a collective sense to denote a shipment or cargo of tax-grain that had been cleaned of its adulterating substances.
bibl.seg: MAYERSON Philip, κριθολογία and κριθολογῆναι. Avec résumé en anglais.
The noun κριθολογία in declarations by boatmen was used in a collective sense to denote a shipment or cargo of tax-grain that had been cleaned of its adulterating substances.
